mapper.sql: id, name, gender, birthday, idCard, wedlock, nationId, nativePlace, politicId, email, phone, address, departmentId, posId, engageForm, tiptopDegree, specialty, school, beginDate, workState, workID, contractTerm, conversionTime, notWorkDate, beginContract, endContract, workAge, age, idCardStartDate, idCardEndDate, hukouType, hukouLocation, emergencyContact, emergencyContactPhone, fertilityStatus, childrenInfo, graduationDate, certificate, trainingHistory, previousCompany, previousPosition, previousStartEnd, pastPerformance, previousResignationReason, reference, referencePhone, assessmentResult, probation, conversionScore, workLocation, rewardsPunishments, resignationReason
mapper.select:
SELECT e.*,d.`name` AS dname,s.`id` AS sid,s.`accumulationFundBase` AS saccumulationFundBase,s.`accumulationFundPer` AS saccumulationFundPer,s.`allSalary` AS sallSalary,s.`basicSalary` AS sbasicSalary,s.`bonus` AS sbonus,s.`createDate` AS screateDate,s.`lunchSalary` AS slunchSalary,s.`medicalBase` AS smedicalBase,s.`medicalPer` AS smedicalPer,s.`name` AS sname,s.`pensionBase` AS spensionBase,s.`pensionPer` AS spensionPer,s.`trafficSalary` AS strafficSalary FROM employee e LEFT JOIN empsalary es ON e.`idCard`=es.`eid` LEFT JOIN salary s ON es.`sid`=s.`id` LEFT JOIN department d ON e.`departmentId`=d.`id` order by e.idCard
limit #{page},#{size}
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET workAge = ROUND(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), beginDate) / 365.0, 1) WHERE beginDate IS NOT NULL
mapper.select: select e.*,p.`id` as pid,p.`name` as pname,n.`id` as nid,n.`name` as nname,d.`id` as did,d.`name` as dname,pos.`id` as posid,pos.`name` as posname from employee e,nation n,politicsstatus p,department d,position pos where e.`nationId`=n.`id` and e.`politicId`=p.`id` and e.`departmentId`=d.`id` and e.`posId`=pos.`id` and e.`idCard`=#{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from employee where idCard in
#{id}
mapper.insert:

(#{emp.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{emp.birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{emp.idCard,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{emp.wedlock,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{emp.nationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emp.nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.politicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emp.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emp.posId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emp.tiptopDegree,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{emp.specialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.beginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{emp.workState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{emp.workID,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{emp.contractTerm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{emp.conversionTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{emp.notWorkDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{emp.beginContract,jdbcType=DATE}, #{emp.endContract,jdbcType=DATE}, #{emp.workAge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{emp.age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emp.idCardStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{emp.idCardEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{emp.hukouType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.hukouLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.emergencyContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.emergencyContactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.fertilityStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.childrenInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.graduationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{emp.certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.trainingHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.previousCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.previousPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.previousStartEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.pastPerformance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.previousResignationReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.referencePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.assessmentResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.probation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emp.conversionScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emp.workLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.rewardsPunishments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp.resignationReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update employee
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
wedlock = #{wedlock,jdbcType=CHAR},
nationId = #{nationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nativePlace = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
politicId = #{politicId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
departmentId = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
posId = #{posId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
engageForm = #{engageForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tiptopDegree = #{tiptopDegree,jdbcType=CHAR},
specialty = #{specialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beginDate = #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE},
workState = #{workState,jdbcType=CHAR},
contractTerm = #{contractTerm,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
conversionTime = #{conversionTime,jdbcType=DATE},
notWorkDate = #{notWorkDate,jdbcType=DATE},
beginContract = #{beginContract,jdbcType=DATE},
endContract = #{endContract,jdbcType=DATE},
workAge = #{workAge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
idCardStartDate = #{idCardStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
idCardEndDate = #{idCardEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
hukouType = #{hukouType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hukouLocation = #{hukouLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emergencyContact = #{emergencyContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emergencyContactPhone = #{emergencyContactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fertilityStatus = #{fertilityStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
childrenInfo = #{childrenInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
graduationDate = #{graduationDate,jdbcType=DATE},
certificate = #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trainingHistory = #{trainingHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
previousCompany = #{previousCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
previousPosition = #{previousPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
previousStartEnd = #{previousStartEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pastPerformance = #{pastPerformance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
previousResignationReason = #{previousResignationReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reference = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
referencePhone = #{referencePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assessmentResult = #{assessmentResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
probation = #{probation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
conversionScore = #{conversionScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
workLocation = #{workLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rewardsPunishments = #{rewardsPunishments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resignationReason = #{resignationReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where idCard = #{idCard,jdbcType=CHAR}
